example.parse: (S (NP-SBJ (NP (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_NOM كل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN قطعة))) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (-NONE- 0)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يخط) (NP-OBJ (NP (IVSUFF_DO:3FS ّها)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM قلم) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))))))) (NP (PRON_3FS هي))) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_NOM قطعة)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ضمير) (NP (POSS_PRON_1P نا))))))))))) (PUNC .))
